divs: sighting detailsleft las in b-757 with passengers at approx. 0100. approaching blue mesa noticed a large wedged shaped vehicle making a turn, toward my a\c. the vehicle was in precise control and pulled up along side mine. both my copilot and my self watched as the vehicle flew formation for several seconds, giving us full view of it's form. the vehicle was at least as large as us and more mass. observed windows, shape, and structure, vehicle was not smooth rather more locked like star wars vehicle, with structure outside. windows along side. waslarger than b-757. the vehicle after flying formation, pulled ahead sevveral miles, made a right turn right in front of us and accellerated then made a left 90 and pulled up to approx 60 and left our sight instantly! the night was moon lite no chance for error. there was no fire from exhaust, even when it accelerated vertical. also no wake turbs as the thing crossed right in front of my a\c at approx 5 miles. we were doing over 600kts. the objects colors were matted dark grey top, and light grey bottom the object pitched up to approx 60 and dissappeared!!!!!!!!!
Summary: FL 410 Vehicle approached from aft left Part 121 Flight
